name: Skutu
content:
Skutu, nicknamed "Scourge," was a human TIE fighter pilot who served within the Galactic Empire. As a member of the Imperial Starfighter Corps, Skutu flew a TIE fighter during combat alongside other TIE fighters near a group of Gozanti-class cruisers.
Skutu's card is the same as the card for Gideon Hask in the TIE/ln Fighter Expansion Pack, specifically the card "Gideon Hask â€” Inferno Two." Additionally, another card attributed to Skutu is the same as the one for "Wampa" from the "Wampa" card in Imperial Assault Carrier Expansion Pack.
